def Script_Execute ( oContext ): oVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" ) oView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport") stri = ("oVM.SetAttributeValue(" + "\"activecamera:" + oView + "\",\"Top\")") eval(stri) viewIndices = dict (A = 0, B = 1, C = 2, D = 3) Application.AlignViewCamera ("","","", viewIndices[oView])

def Script_Execute ( oContext ): #Dont rename this function sel = Application.Selection(0) ImmedMode = 0 if Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue( "xsiprivate_unclassified.OperationMode" ) == True: ImmedMode = 1 result= Application.ApplyGenOp("ExtractEdgeLoopOp", "", sel, "", ImmedMode, "", "") Application.InspectObj(result)

def Script_Execute ( oContext ): #Dont rename this function ImmedMode = Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue( "xsiprivate_unclassified.OperationMode" ) #Is ImmediateMode enabled? curveList = list() for knot in Application.Selection: if knot.Type == "knotSubComponent": curveList.append(knot.SubComponent.Parent3DObject) #Add curve to list of curves Application.SetCurveKnotMultiplicity(knot, 0, ImmedMode)

def Script_Execute ( oContext ): #Dont rename this function #ImmedMode = Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue( "xsiprivate_unclassified.OperationMode" ) #Is ImmediateMode enabled? #Application.LogMessage("ImmedMode at start is: " + str(ImmedMode)) knots = list() Sel = Application.Selection for obj in Sel: if obj.Type == "knotSubComponent": knots.append(obj)
#Application.Preferences.SetPreferenceValue( "xsiprivate_unclassified.OperationMode", False ) #NewImmedMode = Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue( "xsiprivate_unclassified.OperationMode" ) #Is ImmediateMode enabled? #Application.LogMessage ("ImmedMode before applying Op is: " + str(NewImmedMode))
Op = Application.ApplyTopoOp("SetNurbsCrvKnotMultiplicity", knots, 3, "siImmediatetOperation", "") #Result = Application.SetCurveKnotMultiplicity(knots,3,"siPersistentOperation") Application.LogMessage("Created operator: " + str(Op))
Application.InspectObj(Op,"","",4,False)
#Application.AutoInspect(Op)
""" if Result != None:
if ImmedMode == True: #Was the ImmediateMode enabled when operation was started? ReturnVal = Application.InspectObj(Result[0],"","",4,True) if ReturnVal == True: #User has canceled? Application.DeleteObj(Result) else: Application.FreezeModeling(Result) else: #We are not in ImmediateMode, this is simpler... keyState = Application.GetKeyboardState() #Get currently pressed modifier keys (if any) bCtrlDown = keyState[1] == 2 #Is Ctrl pressed? bAutoInspect = Application.GetUserPref( "AutoInspectEnabled" ) if bAutoInspect and bCtrlDown==False or bAutoInspect==False and bCtrlDown: Application.InspectObj(Result,"","",1,False)
#except: #pass
#Application.Preferences.SetPreferenceValue( "xsiprivate_unclassified.OperationMode",ImmedMode ) """

#The following code adds a menu item per light in the scene to the bottom of the menu # which selects the respective light (or inspects it when ctrl key is pressed at the same time)
def QMenu_Menu_Execute( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! self = oContext.ThisQMenuObject self.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the mneu after subsequent calls Lights = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "light", "", True) oDummyMenuItem = Application.QMenuGetByName("MenuItem","Dummy_LightSelector") DummyCode = oDummyMenuItem.Code
for oLight in Lights: oLightMenuItem = Application.QMenuCreateObject("MenuItem") LightSpecificCode = DummyCode.replace("LIGHTNAME", oLight.FullName) oLightMenuItem.Name = oLight.FullName oLightMenuItem.code = LightSpecificCode #Set the code in the Menu Item we have concatenated above self.appendTempMenuItem (oLightMenuItem) #Add the menu item to the list of temporary menu items of this menu
def QMenu_Menu_Execute( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass
def QMenu_Menu_Execute ( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass
def QMenu_Menu_Execute ( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass
def QMenu_Menu_Execute( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass

#The following code adds a menu item per camera in the scene to the bottom of the menu # which selects the respective light (or inspects it when ctrl key is pressed at the same time)
def QMenu_Menu_Execute( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! self = oContext.ThisQMenuObject self.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the menu after subsequent calls Cameras = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "camera", "", True) oDummyMenuItem = Application.QMenuGetByName("MenuItem","Dummy_CameraSelector") DummyCode = oDummyMenuItem.Code
for oCam in Cameras: oCamMenuItem = Application.QMenuCreateObject("MenuItem") CameraSpecificCode = DummyCode.replace("CAMNAME", oCam.FullName) oCamMenuItem.Name = oCam.FullName oCamMenuItem.Code = CameraSpecificCode #Set the code in the Menu Item we have concatenated above self.appendTempMenuItem (oCamMenuItem) #Add the menu item to the list of temporary menu items of this menu

QMenu_Menus.QMenu_Menu: def QMenu_Menu_Execute( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass

def QMenu_Menu_Execute( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! self = oContext.ThisQMenuObject self.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the menu after subsequent calls Cams = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "Light", "", True)
for oCam in Cams: if Application.GetValue(oCam.FullName + ".light.Type") == 2: print (oCam.FullName + " is a spotlight") oCamItem = Application.QMenuCreateObject("MenuItem") oCamItem.Name = oCam.FullName
Code = ('def Script_Execute (oContext):
	oVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" )
') Code+= ('	oView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport")
') Code += ('	oVM.SetAttributeValue("activecamera:" + oView + "","' + oCam.FullName + '")
')
oCamItem.code = Code self.appendTempMenuItem (oCamItem)

def QMenu_Menu_Execute( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! self = oContext.ThisQMenuObject self.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the menu after subsequent calls Cams = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "Camera", "", True)
for oCam in Cams: oCamItem = Application.QMenuCreateObject("MenuItem") oCamItem.Name = oCam.FullName
Code = ('def Script_Execute ( oContext ):
	') Code += ('oVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" )
	') Code += ('oView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport")
	') Code += ('oVM.SetAttributeValue("activecamera:" + oView + "","' + oCam.FullName + '")
')
oCamItem.code = Code self.appendTempMenuItem (oCamItem)

QMenu_MenuDisplayContexts.QMenu_MenuDisplayContext: def QMenuContext_Execute( oContext ): #This function must not be renamed! Type = oContext.Types[0] ComponentParentType = oContext.ComponentParentTypes[0] if Type == "polymsh" or ComponentParentType == "polymsh": #Is the first selected object a Polymesh? return True return False #This function must return a boolean!
def QMenuContext_Execute( oContext ): #This function must not be renamed! return True #This function must return a boolean

def QMenuContext_Execute( oContext ): #This function must not be renamed! Types = oContext.Types #Is the first selected object an edge of on a Polymesh? if oContext.Types[0] == "edgeSubComponent": return True #This function must return a boolean! return False

def QMenuContext_Execute( oContext ): #This function must not be renamed! Types = oContext.Types #Is the first selected object a polygont on a Polymesh? if oContext.Types[0] == "polySubComponent": return True #This function must return a boolean! return False

def QMenuContext_Execute( oContext ): #This function must not be renamed! Types = oContext.Types #Is the first selected object a subcurve of a NURBS curve list? if Types[0] == "subcrvSubComponent": return True #This function must return a boolean! return False

def QMenuContext_Execute( oContext ): #This function must not be renamed! Types = oContext.Types if (len(Types) > 1): #Is something selected? if Types[0] == "polymsh" and Types[1] == "polymsh": #Are the first two selected objects polymeshes? return True #This function must return a boolean! return False

def QMenuContext_Execute( oContext ): #This function must not be renamed! Types = oContext.Types if oContext.Types[0] == "polymsh": #Is the first selected object a Polymesh? return True return False #This function must return a boolean!

def QMenuContext_Execute ( oContext ): #This function must not be renamed! Types = oContext.Types #Is the first selected object a NURBS curvelist? if Types[0] == "crvlist": return True #This function must return a boolean! return False

def QMenuContext_Execute( oContext ): #This function must not be renamed! Types = oContext.Types ComponentParentTypes = oContext.ComponentParentTypes if Types[0] == "crvlist": #Is the first selected object a curve list? return True if ((Types[0] == "knotSubComponent") or (Types[0] == "isopntSubComponent") or (Types[0] == "pntSubComponent") or (Types[0] =="subcrvSubComponent")): if ComponentParentTypes[0] == "crvlist": #Is the parent of the selected component(s) a NURBS curve? return True return False #This function must return a boolean!

def QMenuContext_Execute( oContext ): #This function must not be renamed! Types = oContext.Types ComponentParentTypes = oContext.ComponentParentTypes if Types[0] == "pntSubComponent": if ComponentParentTypes[0] == "crvlist": #Is the parent of the selected component(s) a curve list? return True return False #This function must return a boolean!
